body_html:
For some reason there was a merge conflict, so

git reset fullrepo/master third_party/catch
git reset fullrepo/master third_party/tbb

did the trick. Now running

cd aten-export-repo/aten
mkdir build install
cd build
cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=../install
make install
../tools/run_tests.sh .
cd ..
tools/test_install.sh $(pwd)/install $(pwd)
body_text:
For some reason there was a merge conflict, so
git reset fullrepo/master third_party/catch
git reset fullrepo/master third_party/tbb

did the trick. Now running
cd aten-export-repo/aten

body:
For some reason there was a merge conflict, so
```
git reset fullrepo/master third_party/catch
git reset fullrepo/master third_party/tbb
```
did the trick. Now running 
```
cd aten-export-repo/aten
mkdir build install
cd build
cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=../install
make install
../tools/run_tests.sh .
cd ..
tools/test_install.sh $(pwd)/install $(pwd)
```
